<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/bookmarks/{bookmarkId}/assets/{assetId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Detach an asset from a bookmark.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}

>
</Heading>
